# items

**Instance Property**

An array of metadata items in the timed metadata group.

## Declaration

```swift
var items: [AVMetadataItem] { get }
```

## Discussion

The array contains instances of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem].

## Accessing group attributes

- **timeRange**: The time range for the timed metadata.

items.description: The time range for the timed metadata.
items.name: timeRange
